Name: Beholder Shock II
Desc:
The Beholder screams, binding and inflicting damage on surrounding enemies.
Does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.
Required Skill: Beholder Shock Lv. 10 or above
Lv. 20 Effect: Can learn the 4th Job skill, 'Beholder Revenge'

H.Old:
The Beholder moves in front of you and attacks up to 10 enemies at 215% Damage 6 times, with 90% chance of Binding them for 5 sec.
Cooldown: 12 sec.
H.New:
The Beholder moves in front of you and attacks up to 10 enemies at 215% Damage 6 times, with a 90% chance of Stunning them for 5 sec.
Cooldown: 12 sec.

h1.Old:
The Beholder moves in front of you and attacks up to 10 enemies at 215% Damage 6 times, with 90% chance of Binding them for 5 sec.
Cooldown: 12 sec.
h1.New:
The Beholder moves in front of you and attacks up to 10 enemies at 215% Damage 6 times, with a 90% chance of Stunning them for 5 sec.
Cooldown: 12 sec.
